sn48.41:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
sn48.41:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito pacchatape nisinno hoti pitthim otapayamano.
sn48.41:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva bhagavato gattani panina anomajjanto bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn48.41:2.3: Na cevam dani, bhante, bhagavato tava parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato, sithilani ca gattani sabbani valiyajatani, purato pabbharo ca kayo, dissati ca indriyanam annathattam—
sn48.41:3.2: jaradhammo yobbanne, byadhidhammo arogye, maranadhammo jivite.
sn48.41:3.3: Na ceva tava parisuddho hoti chavivanno pariyodato, sithilani ca honti gattani sabbani valiyajatani, purato pabbharo ca kayo, dissati ca indriyanam annathattam—
sn48.41:4.2: Idam vatva ca sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
